api_list.api_description: Search for works by a free text query.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The query string to search for within the works.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Field by which results are sorted.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Order of results, ascending or descending.

query: Can you search the Chronicling America newspaper directory for articles related to 'World War II'? Also, can you find scholarly works discussing 'nuclear physics'?
